items.sentence: Tom is only a couple of years younger than Mary.
Tom is planning to eat dinner with Mary tonight.
They don\'t have to come if they don\'t want to.
As far as I\'m concerned, things are going well.
Who will look after the baby while they\'re out?
Who\'s responsible for this mess in the kitchen?
Who\'s that sitting next to you in this picture?
Those pants are a little too tight in the waist.
Tom and Mary usually speak French to each other.
Tom can speak both French and English very well.
